channel.title: CVE Feed for Weidmüller -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Weidmüller -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20999|2024-08-03T17:53:23.078Z -- weidm%C3%BCller -- uc20-wl2000-ac%20%28no.%201334950000%29
item.description: In Weidmüller u-controls and IoT-Gateways in versions up to 1.12.1 a network port intended only for device-internal usage is accidentally accessible via external network interfaces. By exploiting this vulnerability the device may be manipulated or the operation may be stopped.
